TITLE: Episode 64 - 12 More Years [Adult Language]
DESCRIPTION: This week, I have Jessica Green back to talk about the upcoming election, the boog bois, political violence, misuse of the NAP, north Korea, Jesus Christ, using the Lord’s name in vain, the Lincoln Project, and how the neoconservative movement was started by disaffected Trotskyites. It’s a good time and you should join us.
